type.models: Cygnar non-character warjacks with ranged weapons, Thorn
Long Gunner Infantry, Field Mechaniks, Sword Knights, Precursor Knights
Gun Mage Captain Adept, Journeyman Warcaster

benefits.ingameeffect: 'Jack Marshaled warjacks and the units that control them gain Advance Deployment
Models/units in the army gain Pathfinder during your first turn of the game.

type.models: Cygnar non-character warjacks with ranged weapons, Lancers, Thorn

benefits.ingameeffect: You can redeploy one Trencher model/unit after both players have deployed but before the first player first turn. The redeployed models must be placed on the table in a location they could have been deployed initially
You gain +1 on your starting roll for the game.

For each trencher commando or Trencher Infantry unit, place on trench template anywhere completely within 20" of the back edge of Haley's deployment zone after terrain has been placed but before either player deploys his army. Trench templates cannot be placed within 3" of a terrain feature but can be placed within 3" of each other.
Your deployment zone is extended 2" forward.

type.models: Warjacks with Damage type Electricity or weapons with Electro Leap, Thorn.
Stormblade units, Arcane Tempest units, Field Mechanic units, Stormsmith Storm Tower
Stormcaller, Arcane Tempest solos, Arlan Strangewayes, Stormblade solos

benefits.ingameeffect: For each Field Mechanik unit in the army 1 Storm Strider gains Advance Move.
Warjacks in Haleyâ€™s battle group is automatically allocated 1 focus point at the start of your first Control Phase. This focus is in addition to any points Haley allocates.
Storm Striders begin the game with 3 power tokens.

type.models: Field Mechaniks, Long Gunner Infantry, Trencher units

benefits.ingameeffect: You can begin the game with Haley Past and/or Haley Future in play. For each model in this unit in play at the start of the game you can redeploy one model/unit after both players have deployed but before the first player's first turn. The redeployed models must be placed in a location they could have been placed initially.
Units in the army gain Prowl during the first round of the game.
During your first turn of the game, models in Haley's battlegroup gain +2 SPD.

type.models: Long Gunner Infantry, Field Mechaniks, Stormblade Infantry, Trencher Infantry

benefits.ingameeffect: Up to one heavy warjack gains Advance Move for each Field Mechanik unit in the army.
You gain +1 on your starting roll for the game.

Friendly models/units can begin the game affected by Stryker's upkeep spells. These spells and their targets must be declared before either player sets up models. Stryker does not pay focus to upkeep these spells during your first turn.

tiers.name: Stryker2 - Charge of the Storm Brigade

type.models: Cygnar non-character warjacks, Thunderhead, Ol' Rowdy
Field Mechaniks, Storm Knight units, Stormsmith Storm Towers

benefits.ingameeffect: Place Major Katherine Laddermore and Storm Lance units after normal deployment. These models are placed at the same time as your models with Advance Deployment (if any). These models must be place within you normal deployment zone.
Your deployment zone is extended 2" forward.

type.models: Cygnar non-character warjacks and colossal with SPD 5 or greater, Ol' Rowdy
Storm Knight solos, Arcane Tempest solos

benefits.ingameeffect: Increase the FA of Storm Lances by 1.
Models/units in the army gain Pathfinder during your first turn of the game.
Warjacks gain +2 SPD during your first turn of the game.
Reduce the point cost of cavalry units by 1.

type.models: Cygnar non-character warjacks with ranged weapons, Lancers

benefits.ingameeffect: You gain +1 on your starting roll for the game.
Caine and Arcane Tempest models/units gain Stealth during the first round of the game.

You can redeploy one model/unit after both players have deployed but before the first player's first turn. The redeployed models must be placed on the table in a location they could have been deployed initially.
Your deployment zone is extended 2" forward.

Friendly models/units can begin the game affected by Caine's upkeep spells. These spells and their targets must be declared before either player sets up models. Caine does not pay focus to upkeep these spells during your first turn.

type.models: Cygnar non-character warjacks with SPD 6 or more

benefits.ingameeffect: Warjacks controlled by Trencher 'Jack Marshals gain Advance Move.

For every two Trenchers units, place one wall template anywhere within 20" of the back edge of Caine's deployment zone after terrain has been placed but before either player deploys his army. Walls cannot be placed within 3" of another terrain feature, including another wall template. The walls are linear obstacles that grant cover.
Models in this army gain Pathfinder during your first turn of the game.

type.models: Journeyman Warcaster, Squire, Stormknight solos, Stormsmith solos

benefits.ingameeffect: If the army includes a Journeyman Warcaster, the Journeyman Warcaster and any warjack it controls gain Advance Deployment.
During your first turn of the game, models in Nemo's battlegroup gain +2 SPD.
Firefly warjacks gain Advance Move.

Friendly models/units can begin the game affected by Nemo's upkeep spells. These spells and their targets must be declared before either player sets up models. Nemo does not pay focus to upkeep these spells during your first turn.

type.models: Lancers, Cygnar non-character warjacks with Immunity:Electricity, Thunderhead
Field Mechaniks, Cygnar units with Immunity:Electricity
Journeyman Warcasters, Cygnar solos with Immunity: Electricity

benefits.ingameeffect: Reduce the point cost of Stormguard units by 1.
After deployment but before the start of the game, you can place any number of your Stormwalls' Lightning Pods anywhere within 20" of the rear edge of your deployment zone.
Your deployment zone is extended 2" forward.
During your first Control Phase of the game, warjacks in Nemo's battlegroup are each allocated 1 focus point.

For each trencher commando or Trencher Infantry unit, place on trench template anywhere completely within 20" of the back edge of Siege's deployment zone after terrain has been placed but before either player deploys his army. Trench templates cannot be placed within 3" of a terrain feature but can be placed within 3" of each other.
Heavy warjacks in the army gain Advance Move

type.models: Gun mage units, Long gunners, Field Mechanics
Allison Jakes, Journeyman Warcasters, Squire, Arlan Strangeways

benefits.ingameeffect: On the first turn, allocate one focus to each warjack in a battlegroup
Gain a free trench template per battlegroup
Lower the PC of warjacks within a battlegroup by 1

type.models: Field Mechaniks, Rangers, Cygnar Light Cavalry units, Black 13th Gun Mage Strike Team
Gun Mage Captain Adept, Cygnar Light Cavalry solos, Ranger solos

benefits.ingameeffect: You gain +1 on your starting roll for the game.

For each Ranger unit, place one wall template or one 4" AOE forest anywhere completely within 20" of the back edge of Kraye's deployment zone after terrain has been placed but before either player deploys his army. Wall templates and forest cannot be placed within 3" of a terrain feature but can be placed within 3" of each other. Wall templates are linear obstacles that grant cover.
Heavy warjacks in Kraye's battlegroup gain Advance Deployment.

type.models: Journeyman warcaster, Squire, Captain Arlan Strangeways

benefits.ingameeffect: Models in Darius' battlegroup gain Pathfinder during your first turn of the game.
Your deployment zone is extended 2" forward.

type.models: Field Mechaniks, Rangers, Stormblades, Stormsmith units
Squire, Stormblade solos or Stormsmith solos.

benefits.ingameeffect: During your first turn, when a Stormwall uses Activate Lightning Pod, you can place up to three Lightning Pods instead of placing one.
Halfjacks in the army gain Advance Deployment.
Warjacks with base ARM 19 gain +2 SPD during your first turn of the game

type.models: Cygnar non-character warjacks with ranged weapons
Arcane Tempest Gun Mage Pistoleers, Long Gunner Infantry, Field Mechaniks, Rangers

benefits.ingameeffect: Models in the army gain Pathfinder during your first turn of the game.
Long Gunner Infantry units gain Advance Move.

You can redeploy models in Sloan's battlegroup after both players have deployed but before the first player first turn. The redeployed models must be placed on the table in a location they could have been deployed initially

type.models: Field Mechaniks, Sword Knights, Morrowan units
Journeyman warcaster, Archduke Alain Runewood, Morrowan solos

benefits.ingameeffect: Additionaly, Harlan Versh, Illuminated One, gains Advance Deployment.
Precursor Knight and Sword Knigth units gain +2 SPD during your first turn of the game.
Heavy warjacks in Constance Blaize's battlegroup without ranged weapons gain Advance Move.

type.models: Lieutenant Allison Jakes, Squire, Stormsmith solos, Trencher solos

benefits.ingameeffect: Trencher models/units in the army gain Pathfinder during the first round of the game.
Stormsmith weapon crews in the army gain Advance Deployment
